mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PW, USER_TELL, USER_DATE, USER_GENDER) VALUES ( #{ user_id }, #{ user_pw }, #{ user_name }, #{ user_tell }, #{ user_date }, #{ user_gender } )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PW, USER_TELL, USER_DATE, USER_GENDER FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{ arg0 } AND USER_PW = #{ arg1 }
